commitMessage:
@@@Use cancel instead of timeout for aborting publications (#37670)

When publications were cancelled because a node turned to follower or candidate.  it would still
show as time out.  which can be confusing in the logs. This change adapts the improper call of
onTimeout by generalizing it to a cancel method.

@@@Recycle buffers used for cluster state publication (#63537)

Uses a `ReleasableBytesStreamOutput` to serialize the cluster state (or
diff) and releases it on completion of the publication.

@@@Revert "Recycle buffers used for cluster state publication (#63537)"

This reverts commit faaf2e72bdaaa65775c2c7cf765430286d2d4f12.
